start: ^Good morning Jess, your outfit is so cute!

c-0: ^Omg thank you, I made this dress!
c-1: ^Could I get an oat latte please?
g-0: ^Dude that's amazing! Do you think it has to do with the flyers?

c-2: ^It has to be! I even got a boost in my Instagram followers.
c-3: ^Yeah...I hadn't had a sale in my online shop for over a month until today.

g-1: ^Apparently there's a lot of fashion girlies that come into your cafe! I have to meet them somehow.
^Maybe you could host some kind of event in the cafe?
^There are a lot of customers with good style here.

c-4: ^That would be so slay...like a little fashion show maybe!

g-2: ^What if I hosted a fashion show here for local designers? I know it might sound weird having it in a cafe, but I think it would be so cute.
^That sounds awesome! We could have it after the shop is closed, and maybe I could come up with some exculsive drinks for the event.
^It might seem a bit odd having a runway in a coffee shop, but I think we can do it.

c-6: ^You are so cool Georgie, thanks for being willing to help with my crazy ideas!
c-7: ^I promise we'll make it so cool!

g-3: ^Well, I've gotta get started on packing up the orders for my shop! I'm so excited-- I think big things are coming soon!
^I'm so excited to watch your business grow!! Thanks for letting me be a part of your journey.

c-8: ^Of course girl-- I'll see you tomorrow!
c-9: ^See you soon Georgie, thanks for everything.
